name: Prototype Crescent
description: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.

passiveDescription.0: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by <cryo>36%</cryo> for 10s.
passiveDescription.1: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by <cryo>45%</cryo> for 10s.
passiveDescription.2: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by <cryo>54%</cryo> for 10s.
passiveDescription.3: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by <cryo>63%</cryo> for 10s.
passiveDescription.4: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by <cryo>72%</cryo> for 10s.
